page.title: 05LONG LAWFORD III
page.content:
Amenities & Attractions cont.
Morning school is from 9 o'clock to 12 o'clock and begins after lunch at 1:15.The first school finish at 3:15 whereas the middle school go home at 3:30, taking with them aproximately 40 minutes homework. Punishment is limited and usually consists of the forgoing of break for the child in question.Detentions and the cane are given out, but only very rarely. The children have to partake in physical activities unless a reasonable excuse is given.During the winter months the boys play football and rugby, while the girls practise netball and gymnastics.In the summer the sports are athletics,rounders and swimming.
